document_data.name: Aurora's Realms Shop
document_data.aliases: Aurora's Realms Shop, South High Road Catalogue Counter
document_data.location: [[Way of the Dragon (Waterdeep)|Way of the Dragon]], [[Waterdeep/Southern Ward|Southern Ward]], [[Waterdeep]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Aurora's Realms Shop, South High Road Catalogue Counter''' was an outlet of the [[Aurora's Emporium]] retail chain in the [[Waterdeep/Southern Ward|Southern Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]] in the mid–14{{th}} century [[DR]]. It was one of six such outlets in the city.
document_data.Location: It was located along the [[Way of the Dragon (Waterdeep)|Way of the Dragon]], next to the [[Red Gauntlet]] tavern.
document_data.Services:
This shop sold the various items found in ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue (in-universe)|Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]''.

It also sold a variety [[magic item]]s, with expected delivery times of 10–30 days.
document_data.Staff: In the mid-1360s [[DR]], [[Mril Juthbuck]] worked here as a counter clerk and [[Logros Hlandarr]] as a service-mage. In addition, there were four guards who worked shifts of two and two.
